General.Name: Medinice S.A
General.Description: Medinice S.A. focuses on creating, developing, and commercializing medical technologies for cardiology and cardio surgery. The company provides advisory services in the field of commercialization of research and development products; and undertakes preclinical tests, clinical trials, and obtaining a certificate for sale of medical technology. Medinice S.A. was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Warsaw, Poland.

0.Name: Mr. Sanjeev  Choudhary
0.Title: Pres of the Management Board & CEO
